steps.desc: Learn a Front-End Framework (React, Angular, or Vue.js)
steps.roadmapdesc: Choose a popular framework to build complex UIs. React is recommended for its component-based architecture and vast ecosystem. Angular is a comprehensive framework suited for enterprise applications. Vue.js is a progressive framework known for its simplicity.

steps.desc: Learn Back-End Development (Node.js, Python with Flask/Django, or Java with Spring)
steps.roadmapdesc: Choose a back-end technology based on your interests and job market demand. Node.js is JavaScript-based and good for real-time applications. Python with Flask/Django is excellent for data-driven applications. Java with Spring is suitable for enterprise-level projects.
